For confirming your registration, we will validate your enquiry and then request you to pay the registration fees (non-refundable) online. Once the fee is paid we will schedule an appointment for an interaction with the child and review of your documents (we will call you to get your preferred timings). The link for online-payment will be sent you via a separate email shortly, post our internal validation of your enquiry. Alternatively, you can visit the school with a printout of this email (or note the enquiry number) along with the documents listed below and contact the Registrar on any working day (Sunday to Thursday from 8:00 a.m. to 4:30 p.m, Saturday 8:00 am to 1:00 pm) and pay the registration fee at the school counter. We encourage you to pay the fees online so that you do not have to wait for a significant duration during your school visit. For further information on the admissions process, please refer to our school website here http://tiadubai.iqraeducation.net/admission-details/. Please note that the UAE Residence Visa and Transfer Certificate/School Leaving Certificate are not needed at the time of application processing, but will be needed at actual enrollment. The transfer certificate should be attested from:
CategoriesAttestation Required From
Students coming from Emirates other than DubaiMinistry of Education of that Emirate
Students coming from OMANIndian Embassy / Foreign Affairs Ministry and UAE Embassy located in that country
Students coming from GULF countries other than OMAN Ministry of Education , the Ministry of Foreign Affairs and the UAE Embassy located in that country
Students coming from INDIAEducation Officer of the Zone/District/Area and UAE Embassy ,India OR Indian Consulate in Dubai and Foreign Affairs Ministry, Dubai-UAE
These are required documents for the registration of the child by the Knowledge and Human Development Authority in Dubai.
* 3 copies of the child's passport with residence visa and Emirates ID card
* 1 copy of the parent's passport with residence visa and Emirates ID card.
* 3 copies of the child's birth certificate (in English/Arabic).
* 5 recent passport size photographs of the child with white background
* Two years of school reports / current year term progress report, including any learning support documents pertaining to your child's educational needs. (For early years, please submit nursery reports if available).
* School Health Form (you can fill this when you visit the school).
* Transfer Certificate(only needed at the time of enrolment).
Registration fee payment to be made at school within 5 days from date of Registration. Otherwise this registration will become null and void.
Registrar
Registrar TIA
registrar.tiadxb@iqraeducation.net
Tel. No +971 04 2646746, +971 04 2646733, Toll Free: 800 INDIAN (463426)

Dear ${object.parent_name},

Ref number:${object.enquiry_no}

Thank you for confirming your interest in admitting ${object.name} with us. Congratulation as your child has been able to clear the admission test/interactive session with us and can now successfully move to admission stage. Mentioned below is the process for admission -

  • Please collate the following documents prior to visiting the school

    • 3 copies of the child's passport with residence visa and Emirates ID card
    • 1 copy of the parent's passport with residence visa and Emirates ID card.
    • 3 copies of the child's birth certificate (in English/Arabic).
    • 5 recent passport size photographs of the child with white background
    • Two years of school reports / current year term progress report, including any learning
    • Support documents pertaining to your child's educational needs. (For early years, please submit nursery reports if available).
    • School Health Form (which can be downloaded from the school website).
    • Transfer Certificate(only needed at the time of enrolment) – Attested
    • Vaccination copy

  • Approved Fee structure: Our approved fee structure for the full year and the frequency of installments is as below. Optional fees will be explained to you

    at the time of confirmation.Please note that we will send you a separate invoice for payment required to reserve admission separately:

    % for row in object.student_fee_line: %endfor
    Fees Amount Fee Payment Type
    ${row.name.name or ''} ${row.amount or ''} % if row.fee_pay_type.name == 'year': Once in the year % endif % if row.fee_pay_type.name == 'month': Monthly % endif % if row.fee_pay_type.name == 'one': Once at the time of admission % endif % if row.fee_pay_type.name == 'quater': Quaterly % endif % if row.fee_pay_type.name == 'alt_month': Alternate Month % endif % if row.fee_pay_type.name == 'half_year': Half Year % endif % if row.fee_pay_type.name == 'term': Term % endif

    The amount payable by you to confirm your child's admission will be sent to you via a separate fee payment request email. You can either pay this fee online, using Payfort secure gateway link included in the fee request email or you can visit the school to pay the fees (cash or cheque only). If you pay online, next steps will be confirmed along with an email of the fee paid receipt.

    Option 1 - Payment by term – term fees should be paid during the first week of April, September and January

    Option 2 – Payment by Month. Monthly fees should be paid on or before 5th of every month

    • Please inform your preference for future payments when you visit the school. By defaut option 2 (monthly fees) will be applicable.

  • Please also note that books and uniform should be purchased from the school or its approved vendors separately by paying applicable fees when you visit the school.

  • Once the admission fees is paid you have to complete KHDA registration and contract signing formalities as mandated by KHDA and MoE regulations. We will explain this further when applicable.

For further information, please feel free to contact me at registrar.tiadxb@iqraeducation.net,
